title: Charlottesville, Lynchburg, & Roanoke Timetable
heading: Amtrak Services to Charlottesville, Lynchburg, & Roanoke
bottom_text:
Local connecting trains are provided:
at Boston, Providence,
and intermediate stations by the MBTA,
at New Haven, Old Saybrook,
and New London by Shore Line East,
at New Haven by Amtrak and CT Hartford Line,
at New Haven, New York,
and intermediate stations by the MTA,
at New York, Philadelphia,
and all stations in New Jersey by NJ Transit,
at Trenton, Philadelphia and Wilmington by SEPTA,
at Baltimore, BWI, New Carrollton,
and DC by the Maryland Transit Administration,
at New Carrollton and DC by WMATA,
and at DC, Manassas and intermediate stations byVRE.
